attributes.action: Legalise the right for motorcyclists over the age of 21 to wear protective Helmets an option
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I belive that a person should have the right to wear a protective helmet for the purpose of riding a motorcycle as an OPTION. After a qualifying period of at least 3 years holding a full Motorcycle Driving Licence.
